abilities.name: Swashbuckle
abilities.description: Pangolier dashes to a new position, assaulting enemies in the target direction with multiple quick thrusts.

abilities.name: Shield Crash
abilities.description: Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground, damaging and disarming nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Heartpiercer
abilities.description: Each attack reduces the target's armor and slows them for a duration.

abilities.name: Rolling Thunder
abilities.description: Pangolier curls into a magic-immune ball and rolls out. Enemies hit by the rolling ball are damaged and stunned.
